item.description:

item.title: Multiple vulnerabilities in Ingress NGINX Controller for Kubernetes
item.description: On March 24, 2025, Kubernetes disclosed 5 new vulnerabilities affecting the Ingress NGINX Controller for Kubernetes. Successful exploitation could allow attackers access to all secrets stored across all namespaces in the Kubernetes cluster, which could result in cluster takeover.
